content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
In 8dd987397e31, when I try to print (Cmd-P) I get

"An error occurred while trying to print: Invalid print service"

It turns out that something is printed after all, but the first column is missing.

In Isabelle2018 it works for me. There it also prints line numbers, although
they are not shown in the buffer.

Tobias
smime.p7s
